org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api

Interface GadgetSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JSONSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGadgetSpec, TempGadgetSpec

    public interface GadgetSpec
extends JSONSerializable
    A specification of an OpenSocial gadget in the OpenSocial Explorer application. This class defines a gadget and all metadata and resources it needs to render.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CSS_RESOURCES 
      static String EE_RESOURCE 
      static String GADGET_RESOURCE 
      static String HTML_RESOURCES 
      static String JS_RESOURCES 
      static String SPEC_ID 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,GadgetResource> getCssResources()
      Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css that represents local CSS resources used by the gadget at runtime.
      GadgetResource getEEResource()
      Returns a GadgetResource of type application/json that represents the EE data model used by this OpenSocial gadget.
      GadgetResource getGadgetResource()
      Returns a GadgetResource of type text/xml that represents the XML specification of this OpenSocial gadget.
      Map<String,GadgetResource> getHtmlResources()
      Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/html that represents local HTML resources used by the gadget at runtime.
      String getId() 
      Map<String,GadgetResource> getJsResources()
      Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type application/javascript that represents local JavaScript resources used by the gadget at runtime.
      String getPathToSpec()
      Returns the path to the specification of the gadget.
      String getTitle() 
      boolean isDefault() 
      void setDefault(boolean isDefault) 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api.JSONSerializable

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        String getTitle()
        Returns:
        the title of the gadget

      • getPathToSpec

        String getPathToSpec()
        Returns the path to the specification of the gadget. By default this is on the classpath, although overriding implementations could choose to load the spec from elsewhere.
        Returns:
        the path to the specification of the gadget

      • isDefault

        boolean isDefault()
        Returns:
        true iff this the default gadget
        See Also:
        GadgetRegistry#getDefaultGadget()}

      • getGadgetResource

        GadgetResource getGadgetResource()
        Returns a GadgetResource of type text/xml that represents the XML specification of this OpenSocial gadget. This MUST NOT return null.
        Returns:
        a GadgetResource of type text/xml

      • getCssResources

        Map<String,GadgetResource> getCssResources()
        Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css that represents local CSS resources used by the gadget at runtime. This can return null.
        Returns:
        a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css or null if the gadget uses no local CSS resources

      • getHtmlResources

        Map<String,GadgetResource> getHtmlResources()
        Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/html that represents local HTML resources used by the gadget at runtime. This can return null.
        Returns:
        a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/html or null if the gadget uses no local HTML resources

      • getJsResources

        Map<String,GadgetResource> getJsResources()
        Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type application/javascript that represents local JavaScript resources used by the gadget at runtime. This can return null.
        Returns:
        a Map of GadgetResource objects of type application/javascript or null if the gadget uses no local JavaScript resources

      • getEEResource

        GadgetResource getEEResource()
        Returns a GadgetResource of type application/json that represents the EE data model used by this OpenSocial gadget. This can return null.
        Returns:
        a GadgetResource of type application/json or null if the gadget does not use EE

      • setDefault

        void setDefault(boolean isDefault)
        Parameters:
        isDefault - true to make this spec the default; false otherwise

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns:
        the ID of this gadget specification
